page.title: 05Litlington Nursery
page.content: Litlington Nursery has been in existence since the late 19th century, but it has remained a small business concern.Like many privately owned concerns,profits have fluctuated over the years and there have been difficulties in maintaining all the glasshouses and outbuildings.In the past few years there has been an extensive improvement in the forecourt carpark and particularly in the restaurant facilities.Light luncheons, teas and coffees are served daily during the summer.Customers enjoy sitting in the pleasant gardens partaking of their refreshment in the open air when the weather permits. French students were working at the kiosk this summer of 1985. Several cars were leaving with purchases of fresh eggs,choice house plants and freshly cut vegetables.
